message.empty: כן_Are you sure you want to delete this folder, ${title}_________________________________________________ש?
message.mustBeEmpty: כן_The folder ${title} must be empty in order to be deleted___________________________________________________ש.
message.aFewCannotBeDeleted: כן_A few items cannot be deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed with deleting the rest_____________________________________________ש?
message.mustBeEmptyProceed: כן_The folder ${title} must be empty in order to be deleted. Are you sure you want to proceed with deleting these items_________________________________________________________________________________ש?
message.cannotBeDeleted: כן_The folder ${title} cannot be deleted because its items cannot be deleted___________________________________________________________ש.
